text: Cost way to much you are forced to do multiple withdrawals of 50 or more.
title: Cost way to much you are forced to do…

reply.message: We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it to be easy to pay back. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash in increments of $50 or less. Of course, if you’ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $50, it will all still be available to you if you need it. You’ll just have to take it out in advances of $50 at a time. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

text: My account is supported because I can get the Instacash just fine but not the loan and its the same account. So explain this.
title: I dont understand why its so hard for...

reply.message:
I see that you are trying to get a loan. If your bank is supported than you will be able to link your account in Plaid using your online credentials with your bank. If your account is not supported you will have to apply with a different account. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please contact us.
Thank you for choosing MoneyLion. Have a great day!

text:
Thank you so much for providing such an opportunity. I think the tip portion should be used once and the full instacash amount you be available in full instead of in increments. It’s like you’re saying “ hey we’ll give you this loan for  $150 but you have to do 3 transactions plus 3 separate tips to get it.  To make things easier simplify it and only make a max of 2 trans actions with one tip start ting tips out at $5 instead of $2. Just an idea.

Best regards,
SL
title: Multi-transactions

reply.message: Tipping is optional, and whether you choose to tip doesn’t affect your eligibility in any way. Pay what you think is fair, or don't pay at all, it's up to you. Just be sure to read the screens and make your selections carefully, and you can use Instacash without tips or fees if you choose. That said, if you choose to leave a tip — thank you! It helps us cover the costs of providing 0% APR cash advance to many, many folks like you!

text:
Great service , only issue is make you take your approved amount out in increments and charge 4.99 per request if want right away.
For example if you wanted $120 that would be 3 transactions if want instantly your repayment would be 134.97 and they ask for tips
title: Useful service with a catch

reply.message: Hi there, Kelly! Thank you so much for this review and feedback! We want to inform you that with 0% APR InstaCash, you can spot yourself some cash anytime. How soon you can get your funds depends on the delivery method you choose and whether you're sending the funds to your RoarMoney account. We offer turbo delivery options to your RoarMoney or external account for a small fee of $3.99 - $4.99 so that you may receive your funds instantly. Alternatively, we offer free delivery options within 24-48 hours to your RoarMoney account or 3-5 business days to an external account. Additionally, tips are absolutely optional, and do not impact eligibility or availability, however, we encourage you support the community and we highly appreciate it! You see, it takes a big team here at MoneyLion to keep 0% APR Instacash running smoothly 24/7. Your tips are what help us cover the high costs of administering Instacash at 0% APR for the large and growing MoneyLion community. Given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub. Thanks again for being the best part of MoneyLion!

text: Pretty good.  Couple of things you say no charge for Instacash but actually you are asked to give a tip and also pay $4 to get funds sooner than 2 days from when you request it. Also need to have a better way to contact you if needed.  Waiting half a day to a full day to get a reply via email is a bit of a pain. Maybe be able to email to start and switch to text or give text as an option.  Can't sit around with laptop checking personal email to see if reply was made, checking personal email a lot is frowned upon by most employers.
title: Pretty good could use tweaks

reply.message: Hi there, Richard! Thank you so much for this review and feedback! We want to inform you that with 0% APR InstaCash, you can spot yourself some cash anytime. How soon you can get your funds depends on the delivery method you choose and whether you're sending the funds to your RoarMoney account. We offer turbo delivery options to your RoarMoney or external account for a small fee of $3.99 - $4.99 so that you may receive your funds instantly. Chat - resolve your issue through the chatbot or live chat with an agent! You can access the chat on the home screen of the MoneyLion app or on the bottom right of the MoneyLion web dashboard on your computer.
